author: RAY Network
title: RAY Wallet
description: Interacting with various cryptoservices requires a lot of different actions and movement of funds. It has to be in one place!

assessments.note: Plan not particularly detailed. Not sure just taking things that already exist and putting them in one place rather than a few would add the most value for users in 2021.
RAY Team has a working MVP of their wallet solution and is submitting a proposal to extend these efforts.

The team behind this proposal is implementing a wallet/swap/NFT solution to serve as a one stop DeFi aggregator for Cardano users. The wallet dApp they are creating will enable all Cardano assets to be stored in a single location.
No detailed plan, thus hard to assess likelihood of completing the parts not already done. There is a lot of complexity in building a market place. how does this work in a light wallet?
The roadmap, metrics and included content all form a well presented project plan.
The team has already implemented the first two deliverables outlined in the proposal. The project roadmap and budget are also sufficient.
More detail required on how the marketplace functionality will be produced and how this can work with a lite wallet/
This is a complete dApp proposal with a live MVP and an entire full-time dev team behind it.
This is a capable team of JS devs who have already implemented some of their outlined deliverables and are requesting funding to hire more roles to bring the wallet dApp solution to market sooner.

solution: Adapting the use of Cardano crypto services by combining them into a multifunctional wallet - RAY Wallet.
experience: We are a software development company (web development) with extensive experience in developing javascript applications.
